headline: An unsexy tech-stock trend is rising as Facebook, social media stocks fall out of favor
Goldman Sachs lures JPMorgan dealmaker Kurt Simon: WSJ
summary: Kurt Simon, a banker known for mergers as well as media and technology, is leaving JPMorgan ( JPM   -1.1% ) to join Goldman Sachs ( GS   -1.8% ) as partner later this year, the   Wall Street Journal  reports , citing people familiar with the matter.   More news on: JPMorgan Chase & Co., …
